entry.title: YogiFi Series 1: Retail @ INR14999. Pre-Order now with INR 2999 down payment. Rest after delivery of product.
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wellnesys
Type: Electronic Gadget
Price: 2999.00

Product Specifications:

1.  YogiFi Series-1 Mat 

-  Eco-Friendly and Non-Toxic Mat Fabric

-  Size: 170cm x 60cm x 6mm

- Guided Audio Instructions for Aasanas 

- Real-Time Feedback on Postures 

- Visual LED Indicator 

Connectivity

- Bluetooth 4.1 and above

- Wi-Fi 802.11ac (only needed during initial set-up and the package updates)

Power

- USB Type-C cable (included)

- Rechargeable Li-On 3000 mAH (included) 

2. YogiFi Companion App 

-  Available on Google Play Store and AppStore.    

-  Free Subscription to Beginner Program package (12 months). 

3. Smart Assistant Integration

-  Google Home for Instant Yoga Sessions and Audio Instructions (Note: Google Home not included in the product. It has to be purchased separately).

4. Wearables Integration

-  Integration with Apple Watch for Vitals Correlation

*actual product color and graphics may slightly vary at the time of shipment.
